lead_paragraph: SHEN--Fred, of Greenwich, CT passed away peacefully on May 31, 2016 at the age of 74 surrounded by his family. Born in Shanghai, he moved to the US to attend the University of Michigan. In 1986, he founded Shen Milsom & Wilke, one of the largest multidisciplinary consulting firms in the world. He is survived by his wife of 50 years Irene; children Stephanie and Tom; grandchildren Jack, Sukie, Jeremy, Cameron and Harrison. Funeral services will be held on Friday, June 3, 2016 at 11:30am, St. Michaels Church, Greenwich. 1/3
